synopsis.text: What begins as an eagerly anticipated summer event for hololive takes a dramatic turn when three precious artifacts vanish, and their leader, YAGOO, mysteriously disappears. A loyal staff member, A-chan, rallies the hololive members and embarks on a daring mission to recover the artifacts, rescue YAGOO, and save the hololive Summer event. The journey takes them to a picturesque tropical island, where they encounter a puzzling trio donning sunglasses and a mysterious figure known as the Witch of Icy Smiles. As the girls navigate through this unexpected adventure, they must confront the enigmatic trio and unravel the true intentions of the Witch of Icy Smiles. Will they be able to restore the joy of the season and bring back the long-awaited hololive Summer, or will their dreams be crushed once more? This summer, the girls' thrilling quest unfolds in a series of animated manga-style shorts, filled with suspense and excitement.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
